column1: Table 15. Number of deaths of local jail inmates, by size of jurisdiction, 2000–2019
Report title: Mortality in Local Jails, 2000–2019 – Statistical Tables   NCJ 301368
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Mortality in Correctional Institutions, 2000–2019
Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Table 15. Number of deaths of local jail inmates, by size of jurisdiction, 2000–2019

Note: Data may have been revised from previously published statistics. Details may not sum to totals due to rounding or missing data. In 2000, the average daily population was estimated by taking the average of January 1 and December 31 inmate population counts. See Methodology.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Mortality in Correctional Institutions, 2000–2019.
